claim_card.claim: The framework proposes replacing the stress–energy tensor with a coherence tensor Φ built from an action-density field S(x) with a scale-dependent coupling λ(r).
claim_card.test_hook: Given S(x) + λ(r), compute Φ and compare whether it reproduces known weak-field behavior and predicts saturation regimes near high density.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Replace the stress-energy tensor with a coherence tensor Φμν built from a scalar action-density field S(x) and a scale-dependent coupling λ(r).
